reviewText: Racetrack farce THE BIG PAYOFF! (actually, "Win, Place or Steal") gets two stars instead of one only because of the many fine actors who were unfortunately involved in a nag of a project that got out of the gate last and not only didn't run "in the money" but entirely failed to finish the race. This forced attempt at slapstick comedy is a slow-moving story of three men who scheme to remove a betting machine from a racetrack so they can print their own winning tickets. It's no big surprise that this movie is NOT available on DVD. RECOMMENDED: Pierce Brosnan stars in THE HEIST (1989)-- a satisfying racetrack crime caper that has more twists and turns than Churchill Downs!! (VHS edition) (DVD edition) Parenthetical number preceding title is a 1 to 10 viewer poll rating found at a film resource website. (2.6) The Big Payoff! ("Win, Place or Steal") (1975) - Dean Stockwell/Russ Tamblyn/Alex Karras/Alan Oppenheimer/McLean Stevenson/Harry Dean Stanton/Scatman Crothers
